name: Providing cover
description:
Providing cover is a 2D tactical shooter displayed in 3D.
Right now it's just a proof of concept. It's meant to be  similar
to old tactical shooters , where you could control a squad of
friendly NPCs. Because it's a "proof of concept", I'm not sure
if I'm going to continue it or not. If people miss those old
tactical shooters where a single enemy can kill you and
see the potential in this, than I'll rework the placeholder
scripts and continue the development with a cleaner
codebase.

Test level:
You are Bravo 1 and your squad mate Bravo 2 is wounded,
but stabilized. You need to survive until the evac arrives.
(No evacuation yet.)

Controls:
WASD - move
E - peak
R - reload
TAB - change weapons
SPACE - interact (drag wounded friendly,
take magazine from compatible weapon)
L/R ARROWS - turn
UP ARROW - change fire modes
ENTER - fire
